Multivariate Elastic Net

Source: vignettes/vignette.Rmd
vignette.Rmd

Installation

Install the current release from CRAN:

install.packages("mixnet")

or the latest development version from GitHub:

#install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("rauschenberger/mixnet")
#install.packages("plsgenomics")
data(Ecoli,package="plsgenomics")
X <- Ecoli$CONNECdata
Y <- Ecoli$GEdata
loss <- mixnet:::cv.mixnet(Y=Y,X=X)
#install.packages("BiocManager")
#BiocManager::install("mixOmics")
data(liver.toxicity,package="mixOmics")
X <- liver.toxicity$gene
Y <- liver.toxicity$clinic
Y$Cholesterol.mg.dL. <- -Y$Cholesterol.mg.dL.
loss <- mixnet:::cv.mixnet(Y=Y,X=X)

Armin Rauschenberger and Enrico Glaab (2019). “Multivariate regression through stacked generalisation”. Manuscript in preparation.
